thread.section_title: Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: good location
thread.title_full: good location - Review of Novotel Suites Paris Expo Porte de Versailles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: tiger6298
title: good location
text:
We stayed at this hotel for 9 nights. The Metro subway station is right outside the hotel, so very convenient to travel anywhere. Fairly brand new hotel, so everything looked modern & new. Loved the room, especially the shower, high above! Thought the location of the toilet, separated from the bathtub & shower, was a bit odd...but maybe that's how it is in Europe. The bed was comfortable and my daughter loved sleeping on the sofa. We are a family of 3.
Room Tip: I would assume the higher the floor, the better. See more room tips
